segments.text: I notice the boy standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high, it looks like he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilted and looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand, trying to catch cookies with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how focused he is on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing next to him is waiting eagerly for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up at him with such anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think they can get away with this without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, making his actions even more obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into trouble for this.
segments.speaker: PAR
